page.title: 14Marlow Bottom - 1
page.content:
{Introduction { Marlow Bottom}lies in a dry valley and is about two miles long. Of the area about 66% is greenland and 17% is woodland but it is disappearing rapidly.
It is quite a close community of 3000 houses with a dozen small shops including a Post Office and two building societies. It has a public house and a private members club. There are two churches and a village hall which is used for a variety of activities.
There is a small industrial estate which employs about 200 people. Much of the surrounding woodland is encompassed by the greenbelt.
